channel.title: Shad Codes
channel.description: Hi guys. i have two questions where do i go to change the ::yell colors and stuff? and where can i go to find out what the Col><Shad colors are? for my ::yell i've been googling them but the give me the new ones. i need like the old ones for like 317's for example Col>255<Shad>000000 like just numbers no letters. Please help.

item.title: Shad Codes
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

Go to commands.java Search for “Yell” And once you see where it is like if(playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
you should see [code]
}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“USERNAME”)){
c2.sendMessage("<col=127158168><shad=128255>[YELLTAG]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "

  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[/code]

Where you see <col=127158168> and <shad=128255> You change those numbers and that changes the colors. I would still try to google it. I heard if you go into paint and use custom colors it gives you a code Idk. Also, I think its called HEX colors.

This is for Project Insantiy. Idk what your using.

Read full topic
